member.name: T:Gurock.SmartInspect.DebugTrace.SmartInspectTraceListener
member.summary: Directs tracing or debugging output to a SmartInspect session.

member.name: M:Gurock.SmartInspect.DebugTrace.SmartInspectTraceListener.#ctor
member.summary: Overloaded. Creates and initializes a new SmartInspectTraceListener instance with SiAuto.Main as session.

member.name: M:Gurock.SmartInspect.DebugTrace.SmartInspectTraceListener.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Overloaded. Creates and initializes a new SmartInspectTraceListener instance using a new session with SiAuto.Si as parent.
member.param: The name for the new session.

member.name: M:Gurock.SmartInspect.DebugTrace.SmartInspectTraceListener.#ctor(Gurock.SmartInspect.Session)
member.summary: Overloaded. Creates and initializes a new SmartInspectTraceListener instance with an existing session.

member.name: M:Gurock.SmartInspect.DebugTrace.SmartInspectTraceListener.Fail(System.String)
member.summary: Overloaded. Overridden. Sends a simple error message.

member.name: M:Gurock.SmartInspect.DebugTrace.SmartInspectTraceListener.Fail(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Overloaded. Overridden. Sends a detailed error message.

member.name: P:Gurock.SmartInspect.DebugTrace.SmartInspectTraceListener.Name
member.summary: Overridden. Represents the name of this SmartInspectTraceListener instance.
